custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken INNER JOIN Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance ON (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId = Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId) WHERE [$COMPLETION$] (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.assigneeClassName = ?) AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.assigneeClassPK = ?) AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.companyId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken INNER JOIN Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance ON (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId = Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId) WHERE [$COMPLETION$] [$SEARCH_CRITERIA$] [$USER_ROLES$] (Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.companyId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken INNER JOIN Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance ON (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId = Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId) WHERE [$COMPLETION$] [$ROLE_IDS$] AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.assigneeClassName = ?) AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.companyId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.*} FROM Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken INNER JOIN Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance ON (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId = Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.kaleoTaskInstanceTokenId) WHERE [$COMPLETION$] (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.assigneeClassName = ?) AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskAssignmentInstance.assigneeClassPK = ?) AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.companyId = ?)

AND (Kaleo_KaleoTaskInstanceToken.companyId = ?)
